thread.title: Police: 18-year-old shoots horse pulling buggy with toddler on board
thread.title_full: Police: 18-year-old shoots horse pulling buggy with toddler on board

title: Police: 18-year-old shoots horse pulling buggy with toddler on board
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: East - Today 
Police have charged an 18-year-old man with shooting at a horse that was pulling a buggy carrying an Amish family in Somerset County....
